attributes.action: Increase spending in catering in all state boarding schools and other state run accomidation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to ensure that the heath of people living in establishments such as state boarding schools is kept to an optimum. Experiencing this first hand, it has become apparent that the food provided is not just unsatisfactory in taste, but does not provide the appropriate nutrients necessary to maintain a healthy body. Problems such as hair loss from lack of nutrients which i am experiencing first hand is just one of the problems.
